dwesha sahagathawath, padanam wirahithawath deshapalana wairayen thamageth, puththalama disthrik parlimenthu manthri arundika pranandu manthriwarayageth charitha ghathanaya wana paridi paudgalika rupawahini nalikawaka wikashaya wu wadasatahanakadi adahas dakwu niyojya amathya ranjan ramanayaka mahathata erehiwa nadu pawarana bawa kaluthara disthrik parlimenthu manthri hitapu amathya rohitha abegunawardhana mahatha pawasayi.kese wethath me thak nadu pawarimata gath piyawarak gana danagannata natha.mita pera ranjan ramanayaka manthriwaraya mahindanananda aluthgamage manthriwarayata rupawahini wadasatahanakadi dushana chodana gana kiyamin abhiyoga kala awasthawakadithapahasa nadu pawarana bawa pawasuwath ewannak sidu nowiya.

parlimenthu manthriwarayaku ha niyojya amathyawarayaku washayen katayuthu kala kala simawa thuladi uthuru koriyawe pawathi tharuna samuluwakatada, dubayihi pawathi kamkaru ha rakiraksha upadeshaka kamitu raswimakatada, pilipinaye pawathi anthar jathika samuluwakatada shri lankawa wenuwen sahabhagiwemin rate gaurawaya aaraksha kara ganimata piyawara gath ethuma ehidi lada danuma upayogi karaganimin thama rate yahapatha wenuwen eewa yodawa ganimatada sahena wehesak daruweya. 2004 wasaredi jathika lotharayi mandalaye kriyakari adhyaksha washayenda, 2006 madhyama gamanagamana mandalaye sabhapathi washayenda pathwu ethuma madhyama gamanagamana mandalaya yali langamaya bawata pathkaralime suwisheshi karyabharayada itukaleya.

me wana wita siyalu rajaye pasal widuhalpathi warunta mema tharangaya pilibanda danuwath kara athayida me sandaha idiripathwimata apeksha karana daruwanta widuhalpathi waraya hamuwi wadi wisthara laba gatha hakayi da greru mahatha prakashakara sitiyeya.brayit star supiri jayagrayahakayata rupiyal dasalakshayak da anu shurathawaya sandaha mudalin rupiyal atalakshakayak da dewana sthanaya sandaha rupiyal panlakshakyak da himi we.meyata amatharawa awasan wataya sandaha theri pathwana daruwanta wishesha thyaga saha sahabhagiwana sama sisuwekutama sahathika pathrayak da himi we.
